text_logic_form: The figure $ABCDE$ is a regular pentagon.
Find the area of the shaded shape.
dissolved_text_logic_form: The figure $ABCDE$ is a regular pentagon.
Find the area of the shaded shape.
diagram_logic_form: The perimeter of the circle $A$ is $12$ units.
line_instances: There are lines $AB$, $AC$, $AD$, $AE$, and $AI$, forming the regular pentagon $ABCDE$.
The lines $BC$, $BD$, $CE$, $DI$, and $IE$ are also part of the figure.
circle_instances: There is a circle $A$ with radius $r$.
